name: Naelara Adventures CH:1
description:
Naelara Adventures Ch:1 is a mini adventure starring you, the captain of your ship! Some bad stuff happened and you managed to get into the cargo bay, avoiding a fate of being eaten by some weird little aliens. Explore the new area and interact with another crew member!

Controls: Right mouse button to move, left mouse button click on the speech bubble to interact with the environment, partial keyboard support, but its broken and not fully implemented.

Want to know more about the game and where its going?

Follow its development on twitter @Bugbear_legends

Or check out my Patreon for early sneak previews!

Let me know what you think of the game so far!
